name: Game Maker (omarglimo)
description:
A game made for Wowie! Jam 4.0

, with a theme: Collaborating with AI.

 Controlls:

 A, D - left, right.

 SPACE - jump

if you want to play on the browser you can go to my profile and you will find a version with the browser build called "GameMaker_browser"

Made by:omarglimo, Nikodem, NightSlayer, Diia Blood
